data.title: Famous Birthdays on July 6
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 6th of July. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on July 6.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 227

Johann Stobäus, North German composer, born in Graudenz, Royal Prussia, Crown of the Kingdom of Poland (d. 1646)

Albert Schop, German composer, born in Hamburg, Holy Roman Empire (d. 1667)

Pieter Burman the Elder, Dutch classical scholar, born in Utrecht, Netherlands (d. 1741)
